snippet: Theo Epstein, Chicago’s president of baseball operations, has big long-range plans for a team that is struggling the way his former club, Boston, did in its monumental 2011 collapse.
lead_paragraph: Theo Epstein, Chicago’s president of baseball operations, has big long-range plans for a team that is struggling the way his former club, Boston, did in its monumental 2011 collapse.

headline.seo: Cubs, Under Theo Epstein, Recall Red Sox of September
headline.main: Cubs, Under Epstein, Recalling Red Sox of September
headline.print_headline: Cubs, Under Epstein, Recalling Red Sox of September
